title: Cannot execute prysm for testnet
body:
Iam running prysm for mainnet geth and on the same server Iam trying to run prysm for goerli. 

While running prysm, iam getting this port issue. Any fix?


[2023-07-20 14:36:36]  INFO Finished reading JWT secret from /home/ethereumnode/prysmtestnet/jwt.hex
[2023-07-20 14:36:36]  WARN flags: Running on the Prater Testnet
[2023-07-20 14:36:36]  WARN node: 0x01234567722E6b0000012BFEBf6177F1D2e9758D9 is not a valid fee recipient address, setting suggested-fee-recipient failed
[2023-07-20 14:36:36]  INFO node: Checking DB database-path=/home/ethereumnode/prysmtestnet/prysmtestnetdb/beaconchaindata
[2023-07-20 14:36:36]  INFO db: Opening Bolt DB at /home/ethereumnode/prysmtestnet/prysmtestnetdb/beaconchaindata/beaconchain.db
[2023-07-20 14:36:37]  INFO node: Deposit contract: 0xff50ed3d0ec03ac01d4c79aad74928bff48a7b2b
[2023-07-20 14:36:37]  INFO p2p: Running node with peer id of 16Uiu2HAm3wVKeHtiRuJ8nXRiVuzAVWksPW14hh26JuWjGyo7Uj8K
[2023-07-20 14:36:38] ERROR rpc: Could not listen to port in Start() 127.0.0.1:4000 error=listen tcp 127.0.0.1:4000: bind: address already in use
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  INFO rpc: gRPC server listening on port address=127.0.0.1:4000
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  WARN rpc: You are using an insecure gRPC server. If you are running your beacon node and validator on the same machines, you can ignore this message. If you want to know how to enable secure connections, see: https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/prysm-usage/secure-grpc
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  INFO node: Starting beacon node version=Prysm/v4.0.7/58df1f1ba5996d299c1c1d5874464884ee551be8. Built at: 2023-07-13 18:43:14+00:00
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  INFO blockchain: Blockchain data already exists in DB, initializing...
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for state to be initialized
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  INFO gateway: Starting API middleware
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  INFO gateway: Starting gRPC gateway address=127.0.0.1:3500
[2023-07-20 14:36:38] ERROR gateway: Failed to start gRPC gateway error=listen tcp 127.0.0.1:3500: bind: address already in use
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  WARN prometheus: Port already in use; cannot start prometheus service address=127.0.0.1:8080
[2023-07-20 14:36:38] ERROR powchain: Could not connect to execution endpoint error=could not verify execution chain ID as your connection is not authenticated. If connecting to your execution client via HTTP, you will need to set up JWT authentication. See our documentation here https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/execution-node/authentication: 401 Unauthorized: signature is invalid
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  INFO initial-sync: Received state initialized event
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  INFO initial-sync: Starting initial chain sync...
[2023-07-20 14:36:38]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing required=3 suitable=0
[2023-07-20 14:36:38] FATAL p2p: Failed to start discovery error=could not create listener: could not listen to UDP: listen udp 0.0.0.0:12000: bind: address already in use
ethereumnode@ethereumnode:~/prysmtestnet$ [2023-07-20 14:36:38] ERROR gateway: Failed to start gRPC gateway error=listen tcp 127.0.0.1:3500: bind: address already in use
